entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:28 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
